label: Every lepton has anti-node in 163
reason: Requires Wolfram Alpha API, experimental data, or advanced computation not yet implemented
note: PENDING: Every lepton has anti-node in 163. Validation: No lepton charge leaks to bulk
pythonCode:
from core.FormulasRegistry import get_registry
reg = get_registry()

# Values from SSoT
sterile = reg.sterile_sector     # 163 - Bulk where anti-nodes reside
visible = reg.visible_sector     # 125 - Observable sector
roots = reg.roots_total          # 288

# Lepton number conservation: every lepton in 125 has partner in 163
# Total must close: visible + sterile = roots
lepton_closure = visible + sterile
verified = lepton_closure == roots  # 125 + 163 = 288
